attributes.review: When I got this app I hated my phone it was the worst bad energy and all plz don’t get the app I was a Trump supporter now I got this app I hate it
attributes.title: This app horrible

attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to support our president but the app took forever to download and it made my phone crash so many times. NOT RECOMMENDED!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: As a huge supporter of my super hero and daddy Donald Trump I wanted to download this app to stay tune to what he was doing but sadly🙄 this app is a scam. I first opened it and when I was eating my lasagna alone in my bathroom but then it started asking me questions and I had a mini heart attack ❤️ so I started speaking gibberish and next moment I know I was there with trump drinking cocktails 🍹 in my expensive golf resort. It was so so so much fun and while I was there I got the best service and got to treat everybody like my slaves ✌️🥺 but sadly I woke up and realized it was all a dream. I HATE THIS APP!!!!!! How could it give me such big HOPES!!!! Ugh 😩
attributes.title: Fake information

attributes.review: It took all of my personal information when I opened it and it took forever to download.
attributes.title: Why

attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app I've been having odd things happen. It started with the ghost in my closet. He's been louder than usual. Then I noticed my water pressure went downhill at a rapid rate, I can no longer take showers. I smell bad trump. And it's all because of your app. I've been cursed.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: The amount of viruses this app gave me is astronomical I was excited to download this app so I could see the news on the 2020 election and so I could help Donald trump make America great but my phone get getting viruses and I know it’s not porn cause I haven’t watched that since I downloaded the app I really don’t suggest you download an app an orange made
attributes.title: Don’t recommend

attributes.review: Something was wrong AS SOON as I opened the app. It asked if it was okay to send notifications, I said no, then it sent me a notification, like chile 🙈. Anywho I go on and it starts blasting this song and it’s like “For🤡in🏳️‍🌈her☠️” It only happens when I open the app. It’s being hacked or somthin idk dude.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: Do NOT download this app! It must have a virus or something as it destroyed my phone!  It took forever to download and when it finally did, I went to open it and I just couldn’t understand what it was trying to do! Incoherent words and phrases all over the place, took me in circles so it must be a virus. What a waste!
attributes.title: Destroyed my phone
